info.title: BC Geographical Names Web Service
info.description: Geographical names are more than labels on maps and road signs. They can reveal patterns of settlement, exploration and migration, and mirror outside influences to our history - aspects of the heritage and promise of an area that might otherwise be overlooked or forgotten by visitors and later generations.

get.description: Searches all names or all official names by name; wildcard characters “*” are allowed.

parameters.name: exactSpelling
parameters.description: possible values include: 0 - (default) use partial smart matching, 1 - edit and swap distance matching not performed.

parameters.name: official
parameters.description: Limit to official or unofficial names

parameters.name: asAttachment
parameters.description: Defines set of fields included in results

parameters.name: embed
parameters.description: When 1 Feature records are embeded in results

get.description: Searches all names or all official names by name; wildcard characters “*” are allowed.

parameters.name: exactSpelling
parameters.description: possible values include: 0 - (default) use partial smart matching, 1 - edit and swap distance matching not performed.

get.description: Ranks the phonetic similarity of each name against the search text, and returns the names ordered by their relevance.

parameters.name: asAttachment
parameters.description: Defines set of fields included in results

parameters.name: embed
parameters.description: When 1 Feature records are embeded in results

get.description: Returns all names, all official names, or notOfficial names inside or intersected by a given bounding box.

parameters.name: bbox
parameters.description: Bounding box in degrees. Format: bbox=minLon,minLat,maxLon,maxLat

parameters.name: official
parameters.description: Limit to official or unofficial names

parameters.name: asAttachment
parameters.description: Defines set of fields included in results

parameters.name: embed
parameters.description: When 1 Feature records are embeded in results

get.description: Returns all names, all official names, or all notOfficial names within a given distance (in km) of a given point.

parameters.name: featurePoint
parameters.description: Centre latitude and longitude in decimal degrees. Format: featurePoint=lon,lat

parameters.name: official
parameters.description: Limit to official or unofficial names

parameters.name: asAttachment
parameters.description: Defines set of fields included in results

parameters.name: embed
parameters.description: When 1 Feature records are embeded in results

get.description: Returns all naming decisions made within the last x days.

parameters.name: days
parameters.description: Maximum age of decision in days (default 30)

parameters.name: official
parameters.description: Limit to official or unofficial names

parameters.name: asAttachment
parameters.description: Defines set of fields included in results

parameters.name: embed
parameters.description: When 1 Feature records are embeded in results

get.description: Returns all naming decisions made in a given year. Note, this resource only reports decisions by the BC Geographical Names Office, and therefore does not offer the ‘nameAuthority’ filter.

parameters.name: official
parameters.description: Limit to official or unofficial names

parameters.name: asAttachment
parameters.description: Defines set of fields included in results

parameters.name: embed
parameters.description: When 1 Feature records are embeded in results

get.description: Returns all names that have changed within the specified date range.

parameters.name: official
parameters.description: Limit to official or unofficial names

parameters.name: asAttachment
parameters.description: Defines set of fields included in results

parameters.name: embed
parameters.description: When 1 Feature records are embeded in results
